mapper.insert: INSERT INTO orders(order_code, user_num, prod_num, order_total, order_quantity, order_postalcode, order_roadaddr, order_detailaddr, order_recipient, order_memo) VALUES(#{order_code}, #{user_num}, #{prod_num}, #{order_total}, #{order_quantity}, #{order_postalcode}, #{order_roadaddr}, #{order_detailaddr}, #{order_recipient}, #{order_memo})

INSERT INTO pay(user_num, order_code, pay_method, pay_card_company, pay_card_num, pay_total_price, pay_installment, pay_shippingfee, pay_point) VALUES(#{user_num}, #{order_code}, #{pay_method}, #{pay_card_company}, #{pay_card_num}, #{pay_total_price}, #{pay_installment}, #{pay_shippingfee}, #{pay_point})
mapper.select: SELECT o.order_code, o.user_num, o.prod_num, o.order_date, o.order_total, o.order_status, o.order_quantity, o.order_postalcode, o.order_roadaddr, o.order_detailaddr, o.order_recipient, o.order_memo, p.prod_name FROM orders o JOIN products p ON o.prod_num = p.prod_num WHERE order_code = #{order_code}
SELECT * FROM pay WHERE pay_num = (SELECT MAX(pay_num) FROM pay)
